name: Spring Thing 2015
description:
The 2015 Spring Thing Festival features nine stories from across the spectrum of text games. Authors chose whether to place their game in the Main Festival, where they are up for ribbons and prizes, or the Back Garden, with looser entry requirements and no prizes.

This is an archive of all downloadable games from the 2015 festival. Information about the individual games can be found at the links below.

Main Festival

  • Toby's Nose, by Chandler Groover - Glulx
  • Ruiness, by Porpentine Charity Heartscape - Twine
  • Doggerland, by A. DeNiro - Twine
  • A Trial, by B Minus Seven - Twine
  • Sunrise, by Lucky Sun Scribes - Ren'Py
  • Mere Anarchy, by Bruno Dias - Undum

Back Garden

  • Missing Since '77, by Andrew Watt - Twine
  • Aspel, by Emily Short - Seltani
  • Dirk, by Andrew Schultz - Z
